scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the Joseph M. Bruccoli Great War Collection consists of one " Daily MailOfficial War Post Card Album," ca. 1916-1919, containing about 175 post card scenes, from the Great War both black & white and in color, including battle scenes, personalities, and events, particularly the visit of King George V of England to the front. Many of the post cards in the album are duplicates. The album has a bookplate of a former owner, Joseph Symonds Hooker, on the inside cover.
